Plot: In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.
Title: Shame
Writer: Steve McQueen, Abi Morgan, Harold Manning (french adaptation)
Actors: Michael Fassbender, Lucy Walters, Mari-Ange Ramirez, James Badge Dale
tomatoConsensus: Boasting stellar performances by Michael Fassbender and Carey Mulligan, Shame is a powerful plunge into the mania of addiction affliction.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 48 wins & 88 nominations.
